title: Copycat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Imitate**
You can attack someone in the style of another killer. Choose any role from the gim channel with a killing ability and they will be seen as being killed by that role. Mafia roles will always show as the generic mafia kill message unless stated otherwise. When you do this, you will also show up as the role you chose to any Town Investigatives investigating you tonight.
**Clean up** *(1 Use)*
You can choose to kill someone like the Mafia/Coven and have them show up as Cleaned or Stoned respectively.
Notes:
- If you are investigated on a night that you do not attack, you will show up as the role 32) Better Citizen.
- If you die you will still flip as Copycat

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 4070
You always enjoyed studying the ways in which killers work, how they think. You spent your life reading about and researching famous serial killers, arsonists, and other sadistic murderers. They fascinated you so much. One day, a crooked desire came upon you, to be just like them, but better!
